code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useSetLang}from"../../../App";import MovieDialog from"../movieDialog/MovieDialog";import{MainContainer,MovieCard,Image,StyledIconButton,StyledExpand,MovieWrapper}from"./poetMovieStyles.js";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PoetMovies(_ref){let{poet}=_ref;const{lang}=useSetLang();const[showMovieInfo,setShowMovieInfo]=useState(false);const[movieInfo,setMovieInfo]=useState(null);function handleMovieDialog(e,movie){setShowMovieInfo(true);setMovieInfo(movie);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MainContainer,{id:"Films",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieWrapper,{children:poet[lang].map((movie,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MovieCard,{delay:"".concat(0.1*i,"s"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:movie.img}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledIconButton,{onClick:e=>handleMovieDialog(e,movie),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledExpand,{})})]},i);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieDialog,{movieInfo:movieInfo,showMovieInfo:showMovieInfo,setShowMovieInfo:setShowMovieInfo})]});}
